SpeedFeature.Name: Boots of Striding and Springing
SpeedFeature.Text: Your speed while you wear these boots becomes 30 feet, unless your walking speed is higher, and your speed is not reduced if you are encumbered or wearing heavy armor. In addition, whenever you jump, you can jump three times the normal distance.
